entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 10:52 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
